name: Apex Legacy
description:
Welcome to Apex Legacy season 5 . Theme: Blast to the past

Update 1 of 10

Bug fixes 

Nerfs and Buffs to Aliens 

Increased movement speed for aliens from 13 .2 to 14.0

Increased range for alien rifles from 1000 to 239 Decreased speed for  rifle shot from 0.05 to 1.6
